tika-abh09t4:3: Puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti (kathā. 1), āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe.
tika-abh09t4:4_0: Ājānāhi niggahaṁ – hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, tena vata re
tika-abh09t4:4_1: vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.
tika-abh09t4:4_2: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no
tika-abh09t4:4_3: ca vattabbe ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:5_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti,
tika-abh09t4:5_1: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti. Yaṁ tattha
tika-abh09t4:5_2: vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe
tika-abh09t4:5_3: ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:7: Puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe.
tika-abh09t4:8_0: Ājānāhi paṭikammaṁ – hañci puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, tena vata
tika-abh09t4:8_1: re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.

tika-abh09t4:8_3: no ca vattabbe ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:9_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti,
tika-abh09t4:9_1: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti. Yaṁ tattha
tika-abh09t4:9_2: vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe
tika-abh09t4:9_3: ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:11_0: Tvaṁ ce pana maññasi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:11_1: no ca vattabbe ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti.
tika-abh09t4:11_2: Tena tava tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṁ paṭijānantaṁ hevaṁ niggahetabbe, atha taṁ
tika-abh09t4:12_0: Hañci puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, tena vata re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho
tika-abh09t4:12_1: paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti. Yaṁ tattha
tika-abh09t4:12_2: vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe
tika-abh09t4:12_3: ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.

tika-abh09t4:15_0: Ese ce dunniggahite hevamevaṁ tattha dakkha, ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati
tika-abh09t4:15_1: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo
tika-abh09t4:15_2: upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, no ca mayaṁ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāya
tika-abh09t4:15_3: hevaṁ paṭijānantā hevaṁ niggahetabbā, atha maṁ niggaṇhāsi, dunniggahitā ca homa –

tika-abh09t4:67_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘sabbadā puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti, no
tika-abh09t4:67_1: ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti. Yaṁ tattha
tika-abh09t4:67_2: vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe
tika-abh09t4:70: Puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Āmantā. Sabbesu puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe.
tika-abh09t4:71_0: Ājānāhi niggahaṁ – hañci puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, tena vata
tika-abh09t4:71_1: re vattabbe ‘‘sabbesu puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti. Yaṁ tattha
tika-abh09t4:71_2: vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe
tika-abh09t4:72_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘sabbesu puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti, no
tika-abh09t4:72_1: ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti. Yaṁ tattha
tika-abh09t4:72_2: vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no ca vattabbe
